page.title: 13Vegetation in St. Ouen.
page.content:
In this block there are many species of wild plant especially along the coastal heaths and cliffs. The Spotted Black rose grows on the cliffs because it likes the warmth. Another plant which grows around Grosnez is the Bilberry which grows in one place along the North coast and is usually a plant of moors and mountainous districts.
The cliffs around Grosnez in spring are magnificent when the gorses, brooms and heathers are in full bloom. On hot days the seeds of gorse and broom can be heard bursting open.
